skillTree.name: White Lion Chariot
skillTree.description: Those who employ War Lion Chariots benefit considerably from the ferocity of the huge, snarling cats, keeping foes exposed to their cleaving weaponry.

skillTree.name: Speed of Asuryan
skillTree.description: The High Elves possess a natural skill that far outstrips the prowess of ordinary mortals.

skillTree.name: Ward of Kurnous
skillTree.description: Isha's husband is the father of all Elves; his blessings are given to those who hunt for food, but woe betide those who kill for sport.

skillTree.name: Ward of Isha
skillTree.description: Isha's protection can protect the faithful Asur through the darkest of days.

skillTree.name: The Strength of Kurnous
skillTree.description: "Tree-cutter? Chayal would find your neck before you could pull that shiny toothpick from its sheath."

target_if: Unit is not composed of a single entity

skillTree.name: Finubar's Bodyguard
skillTree.description: Korhil is the leader of the White Lions honour guard and the personal and trusted bodyguard of Phoenix King Finubar the Seafarer. Thus has Korhil served Finubar the Seafarer with unfailing loyalty for many years, and has stood steadfastly beside him at many battles. Indeed Korhil's gemstone-set belt was a gift from Finubar following the Battle of Tor Achare, where Korhil hurled himself in the path of Morech the Black's Manticore.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +20 with High Elves, Empire and Bretonnia

Enemy Hero action success chance: -15%
	(enemy characters in region)

skillTree.name: Grizzled Veteran
skillTree.description: Korhil's honest demeanour and noble bearing have won him many friends amongst the Lords of Ulthuan, and the heroes of other races besides. Korhil has ever repaid his friendship with the same loyalty he offers his liege, and gladly marches to his allies' aid should the Phoenix King consent to sparing his services.

skillTree.name: Master Hunters
skillTree.description: Korhil was a famous warrior even before his rise to captain. Years before, it had been he who had hunted and slain the great lion Charandis. This was a particularly ferocious creature, mutated by the warping power of Chaos to an armour-hided brute that was mighty even by the standards of other white lions.

effects.description:
Attribute: Vanguard Deployment during forest battles
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Strider during forest battles
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Lionmane
skillTree.description: The White Lions claim Korhil to be the mightiest Elf in all of Ulthuan and certainly his strength and stature is legendary. Yet, Korhil is no lumbering giant, for he wields his long axe with dexterity and grace that makes even his fellow White Lions appear cumbersome.

skillTree.name: Dedicated to Kurnous
skillTree.description: Isha's husband is the father of all Elves; his blessings are given to those who hunt for food, but woe betide those who kill for sport.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for White Lions of Chrace, War Lions and Lion Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -5% for White Lions of Chrace, War Lions and Lion Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Puremane Company
skillTree.description: Hand-picked by Korhil to aid in his quest, each of the Puremane Company understood the enormity of the task before them and are prepared to die in its prosecution.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +20 for White Lions of Chrace units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for White Lions of Chrace units
	(Lord's army)

Passive ability: "Guardians of Chrace" for White Lions of Chrace units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lion's Pride
skillTree.description: War lions which have remained in service for long enough develop a true bond with their handlers.

effects.description:
Bonus vs. Infantry: +8 for Lion Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +8 for Lion Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Vigour loss reduction: -15% for Lion Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cubs of Rahagra
skillTree.description: A War Lion's loyalty is to its kin, first and last. This fidelity, along with their incredible ferocity when they attack, has given rise to a great many songs and poems throughout Ulthuan, and it is with a clear measure of pride that the Phoenix King's bodyguard have adopted the famed White Lions of Chrace as their namesakes.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +12% for War Lion units
	(Lord's army)

Attribute: Causes Terror for War Lion units
	(Lord's army)

Passive ability: "Berserk" for War Lion units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Swordplayer
skillTree.description: The sword is the axis of the world and its power is absolute.

skillTree.name: Valour of Ages
skillTree.description: Panic and fear are things that happen to others.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Dark Elves
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins, Skaven, Dark Elves, Beastmen, Warriors of Chaos, Daemons of Chaos and Norsca

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Expeditious Endeavour
skillTree.description: What the enemy cannot see, it cannot hit. What the enemy cannot see, it cannot survive.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +75
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Militia Master
skillTree.description: Turning an untrained bunch of regular citizens into effective fighting units requires a special kind of talent, and oodles of patience.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Rangers, Archers and Lothern Sea Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bow Master
skillTree.description: Missile combat isn't always about attacking; knowing how to defend also pays dividends.

effects.description:
Ammunition: +8% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +12% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +4% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Ammunition: +20% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +8% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Cavalry Master
skillTree.description: Years of experience in mounted combat has started to pay off; this one is always in command of both their force and its steeds.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +7% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +6% for Ellyrian Reavers units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Ellyrian Reavers and Silver Helms units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +8% for Ellyrian Reavers units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Vanguard Master
skillTree.description: Being present at the very forefront of the assault, on many occasions, prepares one for future engagements of a similar nature.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +9% for Tiranoc Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Chariot, War Lion and Dragon Princes units
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Tiranoc Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Sky Master
skillTree.description: The firmament holds no fear for this one, such is their command of the many airborne beasts of battle.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +6% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +9% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Great Eagle, Phoenix and Dragon units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Master Strategist
skillTree.description: Knowing that it is the rare plan that survives contact with the enemy, yet being prepared for all eventualities, raises this one above mere planners.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Swordmasters of Hoeth, White Lions of Chrace and Phoenix Guard units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Immovable Force
skillTree.description: Like a wall of the hardest stone imaginable - such is their ability to withstand attack.

effects.description:
Melee defence: +5 for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +10% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Spearmen, Silverin Guard, Silver Helms, Swordmasters of Hoeth and White Lions of Chrace units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Favourable Winds
skillTree.description: When the gale always blows in the direction of your choosing, failure becomes a rare event indeed.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile strength: +12% for Archers and Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Archers, Lothern Sea Guard, Shadow Warriors, Shadow-walkers, Sisters of Avelorn and Bolt Thrower units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Silver Torrent
skillTree.description: Speed, agility and control - all must be mastered if your crushing tide is to break perfectly upon enemy shores.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Rangers, Great Eagle, War Lion, Chariot and Ellyrian Reavers units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Heart of the Flame
skillTree.description: The very centre of the fire always burns the hottest.

effects.description:
Armour: +10 for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Dragon, Phoenixes, Dragon Princes and Phoenix Guard units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Great Warrior
skillTree.description: "Let your name be on the lips of every man and woman; your great deeds go before you!"

skillTree.name: Guardian
skillTree.description: In the midst of a bloodbath it's good to know that someone has your back.

skillTree.name: Bonded Service
skillTree.description: The Lords rule, the peasants toil. Nothing has changed in over a thousand years.

skillTree.name: Wary
skillTree.description: This warrior has been ambushed previously and got themselves and many of their compatriots away safely. Such things make one naturally suspicious.

skillTree.name: Draftmaster
skillTree.description: Someone has to ensure the numbers and quality of recruits remain high.

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Elven Healing
skillTree.description: The ancient Asur arts teach one how to heal as well as how to harm.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Elven Scholar
skillTree.description: Far removed from the petty squabbles of other races, many High Elves are able to devote themselves to learning, magic and the arts.

skillTree.name: Renowned & Feared
skillTree.description: This Lord's many deeds - both on and off the battlefield - have brought them renown among their allies and made them feared by their enemies.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Captain of the White Lions
backgroundSkills.description: Korhil, Captain of the White Lions is the leader of the White Lions honor guard and the personal and trusted bodyguard of Phoenix King Finubar the Seafarer.

effects.description:
Leadership: +10 for White Lions of Chrace, War Lions and Lion Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -30% for White Lions of Chrace, War Lions and Lion Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +10% for White Lions of Chrace, War Lions and Lion Chariot units
	(Lord's army)

items.name: Pelt of Charandis
items.description: When Korhil slew the Great Lion Charandis he afterwards skinned the animal and wore it's fur proudly upon his shoulders. Years later it was remade into a magnificent cloak, enchanted by the Loremaster Finreir and presented to Korhil as a gift from Finubar himself.

items.name: Chayal
items.description: The Captain of the White Lions has carried this keen-edged and finely balanced axe since the regiment's founding. Korhil is but the most recent of a long and honored line.
